I’d be happy to @AdeleRene ! What days are you in DC? I’m actually in Dallas at the moment and LA this weekend, but then back in DC for several weeks afterwards!
Come with!
Thank you SO MUCH for doing this. I live in the DC area in case there’s opportunities to help in any way.
I understand
He was sick from when I was 8, and passed when I had just turned 12. Yeah. Tough stuff, but I survived. Miss him still, though.
I’ve heard of him/this!
So sorry to hear that Michelle. It’s heartbreaking to be a part of.

By applying our cutting edge iNeuroxRx™ platform, we can partner with patients and their clinicians to evaluate disease progression & evaluate existing approved therapeutics to identify the most efficacious treatments to help slow the progression of #ALS http:// bit.ly/nindssbir

@acurastem Colorado18yr ALS Research shows that unless the body is corrected+prepared to receive new (stem) cells they can only be a band aid to stopping ALS progression. The objective is here is recovery not slowed progression. Light years ahead+ignored by so called 'experts'.

Our innovative precision platform, iNeuroRx™, utilizes nerve cells derived directly from patient #stemcells , in conjunction with artificial intelligence, to predict drug efficacy, and to transform patient outcomes #ALS http:// bit.ly/nindssbir #AI #health #research

Dr. Justin Ichida, co-founder of @acurastem , will act as Chair of the ALS session at this year’s Rare Disease Desert Symposium at 2pm MST on Tuesday, Feb, 27. He’ll also present at the two-day event taking place in Oro Valley, AZ. http:// goo.gl/ey2A5J

Acurastem co-founder Dr. Justin Ichida was recently published in @THR . He recounts the story of how famed publicist Nanci Ryder’s fight with ALS has helped spark groundbreaking research at his USC lab. http:// bit.ly/2sHceoI #stemcell #health #life #healthcare

Dr. Justin Ichida, co-founder of @acurastem and celebrated research scientist will speak at @Icagen_Inc ’s Rare Disease Desert Symposium in Tucson, AZ, on Feb. 27 at 2pm MST. More info on the upcoming event can be found here: http:// goo.gl/ey2A5J

Do you specialize in ALS research? @acurastem has developed a cutting-edge precision-medicine platform and complex models from ALS patient cells. For opportunities to collaborate, contact us: https://www. acurastem.com/contact/ https:// youtu.be/HZfULe-Klgg

@acurastem co-founder and a dedicated researcher in ALS and dementia, Dr. Justin Ichida was honored with the 2017 “Essey Commitment to a Cure” Award at this year’s Champions for a Care and a Cure event. http:// bit.ly/2EyA4ZD

@acurastem co-founder Dr. Justin Ichida spoke at @biogen on Feb 12, where he presented the promising in vitro ALS research being conducted at his @USC lab to fellow researchers and industry leaders in #biotech . http:// ichidalab.usc.edu /

Groundbreaking study from @BIOCOMCA member @acurastem providing insights into the causes of neurodegeneration in ALS & FTD, and potential approaches to rescue neurodegeneration caused by the C9ORF72 gene mutation https:// twitter.com/acurastem/stat us/963909971988697088 …

Dr. Justin Ichida, co-founder of AcuraStem, led teams from his lab and others in conceiving experiments for, researching, and writing a @NatureMedicine article that could bring scientists a step closer to treating neurodegeneration in ALS. http:// go.nature.com/2BcFre9

AcuraStem has developed a human disease model of Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS) and an assay platform for scientists to gain momentum in discovering effective treatments for ALS. Learn more about AcuraStem at https://www. acurastem.com /
